faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about the parallax effect feature

items.title: What is the Parallax Effect?
items.description: The parallax effect creates an illusion of depth in 2D images by moving layers at different speeds. This technique enhances visual appeal and engagement.

items.title: Can I use the parallax effects commercially?
items.description: Yes! Users with a subscription can use generated parallax effects for commercial projects. Free-tier users can use them for personal purposes only.

items.title: How do I make the most out of the parallax effect?
items.description: To achieve the best results, use high-quality images with distinct foreground and background elements. Our AI will handle the rest!

items.title: Is my data safe while using this feature?
items.description: Absolutely! We process all images directly in your browser, ensuring your data remains private and secure at all times.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the captivating parallax effect. No sign-up required.
